course_type.description: Nature of the course, 1: Compulsory professional course / 2: Compulsory public course

creator_id.description: ID of the course creator (e.g., instructor or admin).

authority.description: Access rights, 1: Public / 2: Classes Students / 3: Fees

liked.description: Number of likes the course has received.

viewed.description: Number of times the course has been viewed.

create_time.description: The time when the course was created.

update_time.description: The time when the course was last updated.

resource_type.description: Type of resource, such as 作业 (homework), 视频 (video), 课件 (slides), 实训 (practical), 测验 (quiz), etc.

teaching_week.description: The teaching week number when the resource is assigned.

period.description: The period number in which the resource is available.

download_times.description: Number of times the resource has been downloaded.

view_times.description: Number of times the resource has been viewed.

create_time.description: The time when the resource was created.

update_time.description: The time when the resource was last updated.

teachclass_id.description: Unique identifier for the teaching class.

teacher_name.description: Name of the teacher who teaches the class.

term.description: The term during which the class is taught.

start_date.description: The start date of the term.

finish_date.description: The finish date of the term.

assistant_id.description: List of assistant IDs for the class.

gender.description: Gender of the student, 1: male, 2: female.

course_final_score.description: The final score of the student in the course.

login_times.description: Number of times the student has logged in.

last_login_time.description: The last login time of the student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the video record.

resource_id.description: Resource ID related to the video.

start_time.description: Start time of watching the video.

end_time.description: End time of watching the video.

play_speed.description: The playback speed during video viewing.
